(kolambaa, lankapuwath) – janadhipathiwaraya wisin parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harima nithiwirodhi yayi prakasha karana men illa gonu kara thibena mulika ayithiwasikam pethsam winisuruwaru pas deneku ho eeta wadi sankhyawakin yuthu winisuru madullak hamuwe wibhagayata ganna lesa illa shreshtadhikaranayata illimak idiripath wi thibe.
